intensity: .byte 0x2

limit: .byte 0x80

data_input: 
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00001111, 0b00010111, 0b01001111 ;      the
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00111011, 0b01001111, 0b01110111, 0b01000110, 0b01011011 ;    years
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b01111011, 0b01111110 ;       go
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00011111, 0b00111011 ;       by
.byte 0b00110000, 0b01010100, 0b00000000, 0b01011011, 0b00001111, 0b00110000, 0b00001110, 0b00001110 ; im still
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00010111, 0b01001111, 0b01000110, 0b01001111, 0b10000000 ;    here.
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b01010100, 0b00111011 ;       my
.byte 0b00000000, 0b01000111, 0b01000110, 0b00110000, 0b01001111, 0b01110110, 0b00111101, 0b10000000 ;  friend.
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b01100111, 0b00001110, 0b01001111, 0b01110111, 0b01011011, 0b01001111 ;   please
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00111101, 0b01111110, 0b01110110, 0b00001111 ;     dont
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b01000111, 0b01111110, 0b01000110, 0b01111011, 0b01001111, 0b00001111 ;   forget
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b01010100, 0b01001111 ;       me
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b10000000 ;        .
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b10000000 ;        .
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b10000000 ;        .
.byte 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b00000000, 0b10000000 ;        .
